law.catch_line: While an insurer is solvent and complies with this article, the insurer may:...
law.text:
While an insurer is solvent and complies with this article, the insurer may:
demand, receive, sue for, and recover the income from the cash and government securities deposited by the insurer under this subtitle;
substitute for any of the deposited cash or government securities, cash or government securities eligible for deposit under § 5-701(b) of this subtitle of equivalent or greater value; and
inspect, at reasonable times, any deposit made by the insurer under this subtitle.
